Question: This person has performed a concert-only parody "Snack All Night" in some of his live shows.
Hints: The parody was pulled from this person's Straight Outta Lynwood because of his label's unwillingness to "go to war" with Atlantic.
This person stated that he would instead shop the script around to other potential studios.
1981 brought this person on tour for the first time as part of Dr.
